reviews.review:
10/10, Una obra de arte. En las primeras horas no se nota, pero después y hasta el final es una obra de arte en historia estetica y música. 

Sobre la jugabilidad; (jugando en modo dificil), logran solventar bastantes problemas del Bioshock 1 y 2, aunque es algo más facil que Bioshock 1.

Sin extenderme en la review, solo comentar que una vez que aparece, la acompañante Elisabeth es la primera que en un FPS me encuentro un compañero que no molesta, ni con sus comentarios ni con la jugabilidad, perfectamente scriptado y con buena IA, una gozada.

[h1] Философия в играх [/h1]

Кто говорил, что сюжет это не про шутеры? Что игры, созданные в таком жанре, не могут быть чарующими, а история красивой? [b] BioShock Infinite[/b] поломает все ваши стереотипы. Очень атмосферная, она буквально противоречит сама себе.  Окружающий мир и персонажи настолько фееричны, что по началу просто не можешь понять, как эта игра может в несколько минут превратиться в экшен. 

Но всё не то, чем кажется на самом деле. Ведь чудесный мир вокруг - не больше чем гротеск, гротеском является и вся игра. Причудливый снаружи и уродливый внутри небесный город постоянно будет порождать у Вас вопросы и не давать ровно никаких ответов. Сюжет же игры очень тяжело назвать обычным и вообще сюжетом. [b] BioShock Infinite[/b] - это своеобразная философия; безумная, сложная, проработанная до мелочей и очень глубокая .  

Говорить об изложенных в этой игре мыслях можно очень долго. Сама [b] BioShock Infinite[/b] подарит вам незабываемые, хоть и очень противоречивые эмоции. [i] А правильный вопрос - "Когда?" [/i].
I thought I understood this game. Then came the ending.

Better than Part 1 (of course!), but not as good as Part 2.
Elizabeth is a very well done Sidekick though!

[u] "Bring us the girl and wipe away the debt." [/u]

BioShock Infinite is a very intense game with a stunning world set in the flying city of Columbia in 1912. The characters are very well developed and interesting, the level designs are gorgeous and the gameplay is brilliant. You would be fighting your enemies with deadly weapons, riding the Sky-lines like rollercoasters to strike a [i] "Death from Above" [/i] scene on enemies and you would also be spending your Salts on Vigors that can give you powerful advantages on stronger enemies. You are always protected with a human defense shield that will break before you even lose your HP while taking damage from enemies. You can upgrade yourself, along with weapons and vigors, to make things easier. These things in gameplay are rather fitting to become enjoyable. 

The story is simply fantastic with a lot of plot twists to encounter. Prejudice, such as racism, sexism, nationalism, and religion, are all put directly in front of you, whether you like it or not. Playing as Booker DeWitt, you are hired to rescue a mysterious girl called Elizabeth who can open Tears for you to help you in combat. Opening Tears will give you a stack of medical kits or salts, a "Patriot" robot or gun turret ally and a wall for cover. The combat system is very amazing where you can do as much killing as possible. 

Soaring among the clouds of Columbia is a truly amazing experience to witness in BioShock Infinite. I would always recommend it. 

Seriously a masterpiece from Irrational Games. 
[b] Personal rating: 10/10 [/b]

BioShock ist meiner Meinung nach die beste Spieleserie aller Zeiten und wird mit BioShock Infinite und deren beiden DLCs Burial at Sea 1 und 2 zu einem zugleich genialen und würdigem Ende geführt, das einem lange in Erinnerung bleibt. Sowohl die Spielwelt, das Gameplay, das Kampfsystem, die Story und natürlich Elizabeth sind einfach nur großartig, sodass man von einem Wow-Moment zum anderen kommt! Wer Wert auf eine innovative, spannende und abwechslungsreiche Story, eine atmosphärisch dichte Spielwelt und ein durchdachtes Gameplay legt, kann ich BioShock Infinte voll und ganz empfehlen! Wärst du so freundlich, BioShock Infinte zu zocken? ;)

I was looking for games but I found feels

10/10 recommended
剧情的话感觉太夸张了，个人还是喜欢bioshock1多一点，第一部带给我的震撼真的是非常难得的。无限虽然也很完美，但由于个人审美+先入为主的原因，还是喜欢销魂城多一点。当初就是觉得海葬听起来太帅了，才决定去玩生化奇兵系列的，为了防止剧透还认认真真地从第一部玩起。一直玩到海葬，心理也充满了无限的感叹。海葬的剧情和结局都太黑暗了。

this is literally my 4th favourite game so i thought i should review it.
it has the best characters and most beautiful graphics out of every game i've played and it had a pretty good, but confusing story. it it a bit generic and repetitive but i had fun playing though. I don't really see any replay calue at the moment. 
but still, 8.6/10, great game and i definitey reccomend it to anyone who loves single player shooter games or story-rich games

Bioshock Infinite si allontana del tutto dai primi due capitoli della saga, riprendendone unicamente lo stile di gioco e le tematiche filosofiche e politiche.
Questa volta, nella città sopra le nuvole di Columbia, anno 1912, siamo alla ricerca di una ragazza di nome Elizabeth, e l'evidente satira swiftiana mescola razzismo, sogno americano, religione, redenzione, famiglia, tecnologia, multiverso, dualità, costanti e variabili. Se avete un pc di ultima generazione, inoltre, godrete di una grafica davvero mozzafiato.
Ahimé, trovo però davvero fastidiosa la presenza di un unico finale e la sua lunghezza: io l'ho finito in appena 10 ore alla mia prima run, ma con un po' di esperienza negli sparatutto in più forse sarei riuscito a farlo anche in 7.
Rimane comunque un'esperienza di gioco da compiere, specialmente se fan dei primi due capitoli o di giochi come Deus Ex e System Shock.
继美国末日2在E3上大庭广众之下展示LES相关内容后，已经从我心目中的神坛第一除去，取而代之的则是曾经在我心目中第二且同样是Troy Baker作男主Booker配音的生化奇兵无限。

没有收集癖的10小时快速剧情通关，不得不说这游戏玩起来真的是头晕，从来不晕3d的我玩俩小时就要头晕恶心一晚上…真的是用生命在爱伊丽莎白。
[u]这大概是我玩过的，唯一能用【艺术品】三个字来形容的一部游戏[/u]，人物自白的留声机我一个都没听，所以时隔多年补票推完的我其实并没有完全搞懂剧情的深意。
我只知道当你把伊丽莎白从笼中解救出来，Lutece兄妹举着两枚项链让你选择的时候，bird or cage？
所有人都会选择鸟吧，愿这个女孩能得到自由。
可惜自由意志的变量无法撼动命中注定的定量，世界线的变动最终走向同一结局的收束。
你拼了命想要拯救的女孩，正是被你自己亲手送入笼中，成为了“笼中鸟”。
[spoiler] 所以最终在见识到了无数个世界中的自己的无力挣扎后，只能选择死亡，还之以自由。[/spoiler]
剧情向神作，射击手感也超棒，强推，补票后二通加海葬DLC，这剧情爽翻

바이오쇼크의 3번째 작품 확실히 바이오쇼크의 색깔이 묻어나오는 게임이다.
바이오쇼크에서 더욱 발전됬다고 생각될 정도로 많은 것들이 추가되어있다.
스토리는 바이오쇼크여서 그다지 태클을 걸수없고, 오히려 게임성을 보면 약간 아쉬운 것들이 보인다,
우선 총과 마법을 동시에 쓰도록 게임이 설계되어있을 텐데 막상 마법은 거의 쓰지 않고 총으로만 게임을 거의다 진행해버렸다...
난이도가 그렇게 어렵지 않다는것을 말하는 것이고, 마법이 게임진행에 중요한 요소가 많이 있지 않는다는 점이다.
마법을 써야하는 스테이지도 있다. 내 기억속에는 한번 있었던것같다..
물론 마법을 쓰면서 진행하면 게임이 편하고 쉬워진다. 그런데 이미 노말난이도는 쉬워서 마법은 그다지 중요하지 않게되었다.
결국 이 게임을 제대로 즐길려면 난이도 올리고 해야할 것이다. 마법과 총을 동시에 쓰면서 게임을 이끌어 나가야하는데 또 막상 어려워지면 전투에만 집중해서 스토리를 순간순간 흘릴 수도 있다는 것은.. 결국 한계인건가.
그래도 충격적이며 미친듯이 재미있고 대단한 작품이다. 게임을 통해서 이러한 작품을 만들어낼 수 있다는게 대단하다!.
정말 부러운 창작능력임에는 부정할 수 없는 작품이다.

其实我是比较失望的。当然主要是因为期望太高。

原本我以为这是一个半射♂击半养女儿的游戏。作为hentai的我兴高采烈地入了这个游戏并且光速下载。但后来因为种种原因一直吃灰。夏促时看到很多人向别人推荐这款游戏才想起了我tm还有这么个游戏没玩。。。

说回正题。为什么我失望。

1.整体的氛围和环境太过压抑。说实话一开始到哥伦比亚的时候我是十分喜欢的。无论明媚的画面还是欢快轻松的bgm以及有点骚气的路人都十分入我心。就在我满怀着玩一款射♂击+养女儿+xjb乱逛街的游戏的期待之时，剧情急转直下。男主一下子就开打了。而开打之后所有的欢快的bgm、骚气的路人都消失了，而且后面全程基本没怎么再出现。正章过程中除了打怪时候bgm比较紧张之外其他时候的bgm都十分诡异。并不讨喜。

2.和女儿真正的互动太少了。除了战斗中递子弹和跑路的时候的碎嘴，真正的互动说实话少得可怜。让我这个冲着养女儿来的hentai十分失望。

3.身上同时只能带两种枪。这还怎么愉♂快♂射♂击？？？

4.正章剧情太紧凑。从头到尾突突突。md老子玩这个的时候比玩德军总部的时候还紧张。

5.混蛋制作组啊我女儿这么可爱你们最后结局就让她消失了？？！！



总的来说，从一款射击游戏的角度，质量已经很不错了。尤其是剧情比起其他很多突突突游戏要精致地多。但是总的来说缺乏吸引力。尤其对于玩过较多的射♂击游戏的人来说比较容易乏味。好在流程并不长。

In my opinion bioshock infinite has a themepark gameplay, you get introduce to the environment, there's an end goal that you must reach, and just fight your way through it, there's no other choices than killing every enemy on sight, but the storyline is why i keep on playing, since the start the story is told in a mysterious shroud to it, uncovering it was a joy in every level it has, and the ending was satisfying and pretty "mindfuck" i would say. This game is perfect for those who's looking for story rich FPS games and i would suggest that you buy bioshock 1 before playing this game or just buy any dlc this game has.

10/10 enjoyed every second I spent playing.

To start off, the game has really good gameplay and really cool and unique effects. 
You are also throughout the game introdused to one of the coolest wepon collections i have seen in a game (My opinion).
The Plasmids and effects to them are also so, so amazing. They are diffrent from the ones in Bs and Bs2, but that just makes it more refreshing and new. 

The storyline and all the effects are mindblowing and if you like a good story/FPS game you should definitely try it out.
And if you like the game or you like Bs and Bs2 you should try out the DLC's Burial at sea 1 and 2 wich are one of the best work from the Bioshock series (my opinion) so far.

Overall a great game with amazing effects and gameplay, +one of the best stories i have played through.

首先，我想对那些进入闪退的玩家说（你们的单怕是垃圾Win7哦!!），Win7可以玩，但必须是64位的。然后是我对这款游戏的了解： 当时我还小，有一天我突然看见Boishock的第一步，当时看见BIG  Dady 的模样很是着迷，但当时还小没有多少钱，况且也不懂然后就擦肩而过，我曾经在我哥的杂志上见到过。然后在今年暑假花50元收到了整个系列的游戏，玩了大概有10多个小时了，第三部和第一步一通关，但第一部有个问题，就是任务的箭头指示不太清楚，有时候你需要找东西是就会消失，然后第一步是没有中文的，那么我就只有边看解说边打，但总体上来说还是feel happy的，然后第三部就明现做好了许多， 还加了中文，但是我发现了一个小BUG，就是你去找伊丽莎白的母亲的第4个碎片(具体也忘了是那个应该是3或4）的时候，伊丽莎白开了锁直接穿过了门，留下我站在原地干瞪眼，然后又读了变遍档就好了。总之这款游戏在我心中的地位还是很高的，第三部剧情很迷但我后来查遍所有资料后还是明白了.我很想知道官方会不会出第四部，因为第一步和第三部DLC联系起来了，但第二部还没有和那一不联系起来，哪怕是DLC也行啊。（为什么我没说第二部，因为没什么太大的BUG或其他问题况且我在很久以前就在朋友家通了关) 
 LostRain
 2018

Looks great and sounds great are they only nice things I will say about this game. Why include ADS when it doesn't make the guns more accurate than hip fire? Why waste time and money selling the player a story that feels like it was written by a high school student in a creative writing class? How do cultists in the sky fit in with the horror genre of the Bioshock franchise? Two of these three features need to be good to have an enjoyable game: story, gameplay, art/graphics. Even if this game was free the story and gameplay make this game barely playable. A warning from somebody who beat the game, you will be dumber, fatter, and less attractive to the opposite sex if you play this game.
볼륨이 너무 짧다

I can't believe I missed this awesome game for totally five years.
I can see people saying there are plotholes, but I do think what make Bioshock Infinite a great game is not just about their storytelling or any of those politically correct things, it's far more than that. I am really happy to see the story is changed after the trailers and demos coming out, it seems to focus more on the characters than what happened in Columbia.

The game does try to make a mind blowing ending, it does try to say something about oppression, but I think what really hits me is far more than those. It's about choices and regrets.
The story shows that the protagonist is a normal man, but at the same time an asshole, in every possible ways. And that's why the ending is so powerful, it doesn't just blow me away, it makes me think about all those regrettable decisions, and what kind of person I am, or I can be. 

I think the best kind of game is which really makes you look back on youself, think about your life choices and who you are, and that's what I can never get away from Bioshock Infinite. Along with the stunning visual arts, great performance, and those couldn't be greater use of songs and soundtracks,  I think Bioshock Infinite is the best one in the trilogy, and one of the best games I've ever experienced.

Also, there do are plotholes, but that doesn't hide it from it's greatness. I would still give it 10/10 cause if it can't get a 10 because some minor problems, I can't see which game does. It's just that awesome.
Gerçekten bir şahaser hikayesi çok beklenmedik ve sürükleyiciydi paralel evrenler gerçekten kafa karıştırıcı eğer bu tarz MindFu.k hikaye seviyorsanız kaçırmayın alın kaçırılıcak gibi değil.

The game plays much more like a generic first person shooter and less like a bioshock game as in levels are liner set paths instead of levels for you to explore like in bioshock 1 and 2 where in you have to scavange for ammo and health kits eve and money elizibeth just hands you some out of nowwhere (she straight up gave me 400$ one time) she kind of breaks the flow of the game handing you ammo and weapon upgrades were rewards for exploring it just isn't as fun as the last 2 games

To this day I'm still not sure which BioShock game is my favorite, but the sheer amount of fun and action packed into this title makes it a strong contender for that honor. The story isn't my favorite, since it's really confusing and has some plot holes. The ending also feels like a bit of a cop out when it uses [spoiler] "constants and variables" to explain why some things remain the same in each parallel universe despite that going against the idea of infinite different worlds, hence the title. [/spoiler] Despite those issues, the story is entertaining and I like the characters, and Columbia is just as engaging a world to explore in the clouds as Rapture was in the sea. What really makes up for the lacking areas in the story is BioShock Infinite's gameplay. The guns and vigors are super fun to use and can be combined to make deadly combos. It feels great stunning an enemy with shock jockey and landing a headshot with the handcannon, or possessing a turret for a temporary ally while you're sending out crows to wreak havoc on a group of enemies and finishing them off using the carbine. Undertow is probably among my favorites for pushing enemies off platforms and bringing them to you so you can get in a few meatshots with the shotgun. The skylines also enhance the combat significantly, and are useful for making a getaway or ambushing an enemy with the skyline strike. Elizabeth helps too by giving you salts, health and ammo during gameplay. She gives you what you need just often enough not to feel like it's making the game too easy, so she provides some assistance while also not allowing the player to rely on her. If you're a fan of first person shooter games, don't pass this one up. It's a great time with remarkable and satisfying gameplay and a gripping albeit flawed story. The graphics, music, and presentation make the whole package that much better as well. This game is an easy 9/10 for me.

画面：美到极点的蒸汽朋克风格建筑与武器
战斗系统：fps与技能结合让战斗一点也不枯燥
收集系统：很多剧情都隐藏在一个个关卡里，需要慢慢收集
剧情：如果前面玩的不仔细的话，后面的剧情可能想不起来，但是结尾画龙点睛 ，直接让整个游戏的剧情上升了一个档次!!
以上四点，我几乎都给满分
强烈推荐新人入坑！！！

Definitivamente una Opus Magnus en todo el sentido de la palabra, un juego fuerte en todos los aspectos, pero principalmente su historia perfectamente bien narrada, un final mind blower y unos personajes profundos, carismaticos (sobretodo Elizabeth) que expresan perfectamente sus emociones  a lo largo de la trama del juego, un juego recomendadisimo para cualquier amante de los videojuegos en general, compralo ya, ya sea con o sin oferta.

Bought this to play for the fourth of july lol   ( The story was fairy good  ) ( the gameplay was fun but nothing challenging even playing on the hardest difficuly i was an OP unstoppable machine only dying maybe 10 or less times in the 14 hours of gameplay) ( the graphics and locations in the flying city of columbia were just AMAZING ) ( only froze twice )  ( playing this game on ultra on pc with a 144hz monitor really shows you how this is the PCMASTERRACE*     (8/10)
best feature of this game and this whole series is the ability to uninstall.
